title: Update Contact Us details and add iPhone watermark across site

requirements.summary: Replace all visible Contact Us details across the UI with the specified address, phone, and email (including Contact page cards, map placeholder text, and footer contact section).
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page contact information cards show the updated address, phone number, and email exactly as specified.
The Contact page map placeholder address text shows the updated address exactly as specified.
The footer Contact Us section shows the updated address, phone number, and email exactly as specified.
No old placeholder contact details (e.g., "123 Mobile Street", "(555) 123-4567", "info@sistertelesystem.com") remain visible anywhere in the UI.

file_operations.description: Update the Contact page contact info cards to use exactly: Address "Lane 5, SISTER TELESYSTEM, Bapuji Nagar, Near Bank of Maharashtra", Phone "+91 9937070901", Email "sister.telesystem@gmail.com". Also update the map placeholder address text to the same exact address (no old placeholder values).

Update the footer Contact Us section to use exactly: Address "Lane 5, SISTER TELESYSTEM, Bapuji Nagar, Near Bank of Maharashtra", Phone "+91 9937070901", Email "sister.telesystem@gmail.com" (remove any old placeholder contact details).

requirements.summary: Add a subtle, non-interactive iPhone watermark visible site-wide using a generated static asset overlay/background layer.
acceptanceCriteria: An iPhone watermark is visible on all pages (Home, Products, Services, About, Contact).
The watermark is subtle (low opacity) and does not reduce text readability.
The watermark does not block any interactions (links, buttons, form inputs remain usable).
The watermark uses a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated (not served from the backend).

file_operations.description: Add the generated monochrome iPhone silhouette watermark illustration asset at exactly this path and filename so it can be referenced statically across the site.
Wrap the routed page content in a site-wide watermark container in the RootLayout so the watermark appears on every route (Home, Products, Services, About, Contact) without creating new pages/routes.

Add global styles for the site-wide watermark layer (using the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/iphone-watermark.dim_1600x1600.png) to ensure low opacity, preserved readability, and non-blocking interactions (e.g., pointer-events disabled on the watermark layer).
